testcase.classname: feature to Test the View Collection Screen functionality
testcase.name: Validate login is successful with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed When User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed Then User navigated to the home page........................................passed

testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed When User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And User click on the View Collection under the Orders Module...............passed And The View Collection Screen is displayed or not..........................passed Then Select the State.......................................................passed And The User Select the Sales Person........................................passed And The user Select the From date and ToDate................................passed And The user Click on the Search button.....................................passed Then User Click on the Order Check box......................................passed And Click on the Received button............................................passed When The user enter the data in Reason field................................passed And User Click on the save button...........................................passed And Verify the Collection Accepted Validation msg is displayed or not.......passed And Verify the Status is updated or not.....................................passed

testcase.classname: feature to Test the View Collection Screen functionality
testcase.name: Verify the Pagination functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed When User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed And User click on the View Collection under the Orders Module...............passed And The View Collection Screen is displayed or not..........................passed And The user Select the From date and ToDate................................passed And The user Click on the Search button.....................................passed Then By default ten records are displayed...................................passed And check whether it is navigating to the after page records when the user clicks on Next page icon.passed And check whether it is navigating to the before page records when the user clicks on before page icon.passed And check whether it is displaying the last page records when the user clicks on last page icon.passed And check whether it is displaying the first page records when the user clicks on first page icon.passed
